page.title: 18Changes in Thurmaston.
page.content:
Thurmaston has grown a lot over the last fifty years. Many of the fields and allotments have now become housing estates. Sand and gravel for building came from local pits that have now disappeared along with the brickworks. New industrial estates have grown up on the edges of Thurmaston.
The people have changed too. Many have left to find work elsewhere. Others have move out from Leicester. In a survey of third and fourth year children at Church Hill Junior School, 17% had moved there in the last three years; 15% between 3 & 6 years ago and another 28% between 6 & 10 years ago. That means over half the children in the school were not born in the village but their families had moved in later.
